Primary Contact: Patricia Goertzen, Executive Director; Email: patricia@handsinservice.ca
Service Details: - Provides basic house cleaning, laundry and simple food preparation at no cost for those in our community under the age of 65 who have health concerns or disabilities that limit basic activities- Also partners with local food banks to deliver regular food hampers
Eligibility: Ages: 65 year(s) and underWith the exception of food hamper delivery recipients or referral information for which there is no age limitation
How to Apply: Request application forms by phone, by e-mail, or visit the 'Clients' page on our website
Address & Map: 1889 Springfield Rd, Ste 206Kelowna, BC     V1Y 5V5View MapQuest Map
